entry.title: WIND WARNING, Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 a.m. EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this morning. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning then to 60 gusting to 90 near noon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
